page.title: 07MOVEMENT OF POPULATION
page.content: The survey of Lymm shows that the majority of people living in this area have lived in their present homes from 11 to 20 years, with only a few people living in their present homes under one year. More than half of the people surveyed have lived in their present homes over 6 years. The majority of Lymm's population have lived there for 11 to 21 years. A small proportion of the population have lived in Lymm for under one year. More than half of the people surveyed have lived in the area for more than six years. Over a third of the people surveyed have had to move area because of employment more than 3 or 4 times. One third have not moved in their working life.
